article.headline: St. Bonaventure 65, Bucknell 62
article.story: OLEAN, N.Y. (AP)Michael Lee scored 24 points and grabbed eight rebounds to lead St. Bonaventure to a 65-62 win over Bucknell Saturday. Zarryon Fereti added 21 points and six rebounds for the Bonnies. Tyler Benson scored seven points and had six rebounds. Justin Castleberry led Bucknell (5-9) with 22 points, 18 of them from beyond the arc. Stephen Tyree added 10 for the Bisons. St. Bonevanture held Bucknell's leading scorer -- John Griffin, who's averaging 13.2 points per game -- to four points. Down eight with just over six minutes left, the Bonnies went on a 9-0 run to take a 56-55 lead with 3:46 remaining. With 19 seconds remaining, Lee took a pass from Fereti in the paint, got fouled and hit the layup. Lee converted the free throw to give St. Bonaventure (6-8) a 64-62 lead it would not relinquish.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
